text:
Hey, I'm working on the transaction proposal/transaction endpoints,
these two proto definition are a bit confusing to me, 
compared with the sdk spec, doesn't that mean `chaincode proposal` it still a kind of `transaction proposal`,
but convey chaincode related payload?

<https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/master/protos/peer/fabric_proposal.proto>
<https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/master/protos/peer/chaincode_proposal.proto>
I suspect we need to modify the SDK spec to fit this.
suggest post to fabric SDK dev channel
